description: Docklands Light Railway: No service due to strike action. A reduced service will resume tomorrow. Your tickets will be accepted on the local buses and the Underground and Overground.
Metropolitan Line: Severe delays between Wembley Park and Aldgate while we fix a signal failure at Baker Street. GOOD SERVICE on the rest of the line.

Victoria Line: No service between Seven Sisters and Walthamstow Central only, while we fix a signal failure at Walthamstow Central. SEVERE DELAYS on the rest of the line. Tickets are being accepted on Greater Anglia, Great Northern, South Western trains, Southeastern and Local bus services.
